Class PiecewiseChebyshev: approximates a function using piecewise Chebyshev polynomials on quantum circuit. It takes function f(x), degree d, breakpoints, number of state qubits. It builds quantum circuit implementing approximation. Provides properties for breakpoints, degree, function, number of qubits, polynomials. It validates configuration, resets registers, builds internal representation.

Business intent: Provide a quantum circuit component for approximating arbitrary functions via piecewise Chebyshev polynomials, enabling quantum algorithms that need function evaluation (e.g., quantum linear systems, amplitude estimation). So business intent: facilitate quantum arithmetic and algorithm design by offering a reusable library component.

Keywords: quantum circuit, Chebyshev approximation, piecewise polynomial, function approximation, quantum arithmetic, quantum algorithms, state qubits, breakpoints, degree, quantum library.
